courseSectionInformation: 2 undergraduate hours. 2 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CI 465. Requires concurrent enrollment in EDPR 432.
description: Emphasizes developmentally appropriate practices for the teaching of reading and writing in grades K-2. 2 undergraduate hours. 2 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CI 465. Requires concurrent enrollment in EDPR 432.
label: Lang Literacy in EC Educ II
